page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE IN LOXLEY
page.content: I am 9 years old. I get up at 7.30am, wash, brush my teeth and get dressed. I have my breakfast, pack my bag and walk to school. When the bell goes at 8.50 a.m. I go into the classroom. We read while we have the register. Then we do Maths and English. At 10.15. we have Assembly. We sing hymms, say prayers and have a story. Then it is playtime. After playtime we do more Maths and English. At 12.00. we have dinner in the hall and then we play outside until 1.15 pm. We go back into the classroom and have art and group work when we work at different topics. Sometimes we play rounders. At 2.15 p.m. it is playtime again. Then we have music, literature, poetry and drama. We finish school at 3.30pm and go home. When I get home I sometimes go swimming then I go home for tea, play and watch t.v. 9 p.m. is bedtime.
